transArray.content: The breakfast is very delicious and it is very close to Beijing Chaoyang Railway Station. The nearby Dayali is very convenient for eating. I will bring my colleagues here to stay next time.

Your satisfaction is the biggest thing in our work. Hanting Hotel Chaoyang Railway Station has always provided every guest with the most sincere and enthusiastic service to give every guest a home away from home experience. Your smile is our best reward. Thank you for your choice. Looking forward to meeting you again and wishing you a happy life!
